HSBC credit card brings you around the world. A series of travel rewards programmes with different merchant partners are launched for the first time, including frequent flyer and hotel loyalty programmes, rewarding you with time-limited offers to travel smarter! Through the HSBC Reward+ app, you can convert RewardCash into air miles and hotel points. Air miles or points will be instantly credited4 to your account with no other handling fees. With so many more offers, it is now easier than ever to spend RewardCash, be ready to get on a flight anytime!

Click here to find out more functions on HSBC Reward+!

Use your RewardCash just the way you like. Download Reward+ to start enjoying the experience.


HSBC credit card, the best credit card in town*. The one that has it all.

Please read the following remarks.

* According to Online Credit Card Survey conducted by Ipsos in Hong Kong (2023) (Sample size = 1,000 credit card holders in Hong Kong).

  1. You must connect your respective travel rewards programme account to HSBC Reward+ before making any miles or points conversions. You only need to connect once during the specific promotional period.
  2. You have to log in to your registered travel rewards programme account in the respective App or website to view balance. If you do not receive the extra offers, please contact the participating travel rewards partners.
  3. A minimum of $40 RewardCash is required for each conversion.
  4. British Airways Executive Club Avios will be credited to your Avios account within 2 weeks of conversion.
  5. The basic and bonus points of the travel rewards programmes (except Cathay Membership Programme) will be credited to your account in two separate entries after conversion.
